attributes.action: Mark the passing of Henry Allingham  by dedicating a permanent memoral on the vacant Trafalgar Square plinth to celebrate the passing of a generation of like minded men and woman who served the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: henry allingham was a truly great britain, serving his country without question and carrying on serving throughout his long life to inform the following generations of the horrors of war. a living history lesson and the last link with a piece of britain's past.loved by all who met him and even by those who only knew him through the media.it would be a fitting reminder to us all.

rejection.details: The Trafalgar Square plinths fall within the remit of the Mayor of London, and not central Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
